  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:sodis.de:ASP-05500680.121</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>DE.FWU</catalog>
            <entry>ASP-05500680.121</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Distribution of Tropical Coral Reefs</string>
            <string language="en">Distribution of Tropical Coral Reefs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Distribution des récifs de corail tropicaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Distribuição de recifes corais tropicais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Distribuzione dei reefs di corallo tropicali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διανομή των τροπικών κοραλλιογενών υφάλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Distribución de filones coralinos tropicales</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">The distribution of tropical coral reefs is dependent on several conditions: The water temperature on average must not be lower than 20 °C. There must be a rocky substrate. Ther sea bottom has to be shallow enough so that sufficient sunlight can reach the corals.</string>
            <string language="en">The distribution of tropical coral reefs is dependent on several conditions: The water temperature on average must not be lower than 20 °C. There must be a rocky substrate. Ther sea bottom has to be shallow enough so that sufficient sunlight can reach the corals.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Coral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Reef</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Atoll</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Ecosystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>3</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La distribution des récifs de corail tropicaux 
dépend de plusieurs conditions : La température de l'eau en 
moyenne ne doit pas être inférieure au °C 20. Il doit y a un 
substrat rocheux. Le bas de mer de Ther doit être assez peu 
profond de sorte que la lumière du soleil suffisante puisse atteindre
les coraux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A distribuição de recifes corais tropicais é 
dependente de diversas circunstâncias: A temperatura de água 
na média não deve ser mais baixa de o °C 20. Deve haver uma 
carcaça rochosa. O fundo do mar de Ther tem que ser raso 
bastante de modo que a luz solar suficiente possa alcançar os corais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La distribuzione dei reefs di corallo tropicali 
dipende da parecchie circostanze: La temperatura dell'acqua in 
media non deve essere più bassa di il °C 20. Ci deve essere un 
substrato roccioso. La parte inferiore del mare di Ther deve 
essere abbastanza poco profonda in moda da potere raggiungere la luce 
solare sufficiente i corals.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διανομή των τροπικών κοραλλιογενών υφάλων εξαρτάται
από διάφορους όρους: Η θερμοκρασία ύδατος δεν πρέπει κατά
μέσον όρο να είναι χαμηλότερη από 20 °C. Πρέπει να 
υπάρξει ένα δύσκολο υπόστρωμα. Ο πυθμένας της θάλασσας 
Ther πρέπει να είναι αρκετά ρηχός έτσι ώστε το ικανοποιητικό
φως του ήλιου μπορεί να φθάσει στα κοράλλια.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La distribución de filones coralinos tropicales 
es dependiente en varias condiciones: La temperatura del agua en
promedio no debe ser más baja de el °C 20. Debe haber un 
substrato rocoso. El fondo del mar de Ther tiene que ser 
bastante bajo de modo que la suficiente luz del sol pueda alcanzar los
corales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Corail</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Récif</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Atoll</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Écosystème</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
